mapper.select: select count(*)/#{showLimit} from question where state=true
mapper.delete: delete from question where id=#{questionID} and userID=#{userID}
mapper.update: update questionAnswer set context=#{context} where userID=#{userID} and questionID=#{questionID}
mapper.select: SELECT questionHeader,state AS questionStatus,question.context AS questionContent,user.name AS questionPersonName,user.pictureURL AS questionPersonPicture,question.time AS questionTime,question.id AS questionID,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM questionAnswer WHERE questionAnswer.questionID=question.id) AS questionAnswerCount , users.pictureURL AS questionAnswerPersonURL,users.name AS questionAnswerPersonName,questionAnswer.context AS questionAnswerContent,questionAnswer.time AS questionAnswerTime FROM question INNER JOIN questionAnswer ON question.answerID =questionAnswer.id INNER JOIN USER AS users ON questionAnswer.userID=users.id INNER JOIN USER ON question.userID=user.id WHERE question.id=#{_parameter}
